snippet.title: Streets of Rage 4 - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/985890/Streets_of_Rage_4/  
PS4 USA: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP1482-CUSA16237_00-00STREETSOFRAGE4
Nintendo eShop: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/streets-of-rage-4-switch/ 
PS4 EU: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP1470-CUSA16221_00-00STREETSOFRAGE4
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/streets_of_rage_4
Humble Bundle: https://fr.humblebundle.com/store/streets-of-rage-4
Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/p/streets-of-rage-4/9n7h54kncb9n?activetab=pivot:overviewtab

The wait is over! Streets of Rage 4 is now available on PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One for $24,99!

Lizardcube, Guard Crush Games and Dotemu are thrilled to present Streets of Rage 4. 

Featuring hand-drawn visuals from the team behind 2017’s gorgeous Wonder Boy: The Dragon’s Trap remake, Streets of Rage 4 builds upon the classic trilogy’s gameplay with new mechanics, a fresh story and a gauntlet of dangerous stages with a serious crime problem. 

Official Website: https://www.streets4rage.com
Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/StreetsofRage4 
Twitter Dotemu: https://twitter.com/Dotemu
Twitter Lizardcube: https://twitter.com/lizardcube
Twitter Guard Crush Games: https://twitter.com/Guard_Crush

Trailer - Bobby Prod (https://bobbyprod.com)
Music - Kirosen (https://kirosen.com)

Trailer production: Bobby Prod 
Production direction, storyboard: Balak
Production Manager: Jérôme Bonnaventurier
Art direction, character design, layout posing: Ben Fiquet
Backgrounds, colors: Mikael Robert
Animation: Juanma Laguna, Yukio Takatsu, Balak, Eduardo Adsuara
Compositing: Damien Gaillardon

© SEGA, © 2018 Dotemu, all rights reserved. Developed by Lizardcube, Guard Crush Games and Dotemu
